INSERT INTO TH_POS_PORT ( OBJ_ID ,REF_OBJ_ID ,SITE_ID ,EQP_ID ,PORT_ID ,ACES_MODE_CD ,STAT_CD ,PREV_STAT_CD ,TRSF_STAT_CD ,CARR_ID ,EVNT_NM ,PREV_EVNT_NM ,CSTM_EVNT_NM ,PREV_CSTM_EVNT_NM ,USE_STAT_CD ,RSN_CD ,TRNS_CM ,CRT_USER_ID ,CRT_DT ,MDFY_USER_ID ,MDFY_DT ,FNL_EVNT_DT ,TID ,CTRL_MODE_CD
) SELECT (SELECT TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISSFF6') || '-' || SYS_GUID() FROM DUAL) AS OBJ_ID ,OBJ_ID AS REF_OBJ_ID ,SITE_ID ,EQP_ID ,PORT_ID ,ACES_MODE_CD ,STAT_CD ,PREV_STAT_CD ,TRSF_STAT_CD ,CARR_ID ,EVNT_NM ,PREV_EVNT_NM ,CSTM_EVNT_NM ,PREV_CSTM_EVNT_NM ,USE_STAT_CD ,RSN_CD ,TRNS_CM ,CRT_USER_ID ,CRT_DT ,MDFY_USER_ID ,MDFY_DT ,FNL_EVNT_DT ,TID ,CTRL_MODE_CD FROM TN_POS_PORT WHERE OBJ_ID = #{objId}

INSERT INTO TH_POS_EQP ( OBJ_ID ,SITE_ID ,EQP_ID ,EQP_NM ,EQP_CLS_ID ,SORTER_MODE_YN ,STAT_CD ,PREV_STAT_CD ,STAT_CD_DT ,PREV_STAT_DT ,PROC_STAT_CD ,PREV_PROC_STAT_CD ,PROC_STAT_CD_DT ,PREV_PROC_STAT_DT ,CTRL_MODE_CD ,PREV_CTRL_MODE_CD ,CTRL_MODE_DT ,PREV_CTRL_MODE_DT ,OPRTN_MODE_CD ,PREV_OPRTN_MODE_CD ,OPRTN_MODE_DT ,PREV_OPRTN_MODE_DT ,PROC_LOT_CNT ,CPCT ,EVNT_NM ,PREV_EVNT_NM ,CSTM_EVNT_NM ,PREV_CSTM_EVNT_NM ,USE_STAT_CD ,RSN_CD ,TRNS_CM ,CRT_USER_ID ,CRT_DT ,MDFY_USER_ID ,MDFY_DT ,FNL_EVNT_DT ,TID ,AUTO_DSP_YN ,INTLK_YN ) SELECT (SELECT TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISSFF6') || '-' || SYS_GUID() FROM DUAL) AS OBJ_ID ,OBJ_ID AS REF_OBJ_ID ,SITE_ID ,EQP_ID ,EQP_NM ,EQP_CLS_ID ,SORTER_MODE_YN ,STAT_CD ,PREV_STAT_CD ,STAT_CD_DT ,PREV_STAT_DT ,PROC_STAT_CD ,PREV_PROC_STAT_CD ,PROC_STAT_CD_DT ,PREV_PROC_STAT_DT ,CTRL_MODE_CD ,PREV_CTRL_MODE_CD ,CTRL_MODE_DT ,PREV_CTRL_MODE_DT ,OPRTN_MODE_CD ,PREV_OPRTN_MODE_CD ,OPRTN_MODE_DT ,PREV_OPRTN_MODE_DT ,PROC_LOT_CNT ,CPCT ,EVNT_NM ,PREV_EVNT_NM ,CSTM_EVNT_NM ,PREV_CSTM_EVNT_NM ,USE_STAT_CD ,RSN_CD ,TRNS_CM ,CRT_USER_ID ,CRT_DT ,MDFY_USER_ID ,MDFY_DT ,FNL_EVNT_DT ,TID ,AUTO_DSP_YN ,INTLK_YN FROM TN_POS_EQP WHERE OBJ_ID = #{objId}
mapper.select: SELECT P.SITE_ID ,P.EQP_ID ,R.EQP_TYP ,P.STAT_CD ,P.PROC_STAT_CD ,P.SORTER_MODE_YN ,P.CTRL_MODE_CD ,P.OPRTN_MODE_CD ,P.INTLK_YN ,P.AUTO_DSP_YN ,R.INLINE_YN ,R.EQP_INLINE_SEQ ,R.EQP_INLINE_ID ,R.MODEL_TYP ,R.SORTER_MODE_AVAIL_YN FROM TN_POS_EQP P, TN_RDS_EQP R WHERE P.SITE_ID = R.SITE_ID AND P.EQP_ID = R.EQP_ID AND P.SITE_ID = #{siteId} AND P.EQP_ID = #{eqpId} AND P.USE_STAT_CD = #{useStatCd} AND R.USE_STAT_CD = #{useStatCd}

SELECT R.EQP_ID, R.EQP_TYP, R.MODEL_TYP, R.BATCH_YN, R.INLINE_YN, R.EQP_INLINE_SEQ, R.EQP_INLINE_ID, R.SORTER_MODE_AVAIL_YN, P.STAT_CD, P.PROC_STAT_CD, P.CTRL_MODE_CD, P.OPRTN_MODE_CD, P.SORTER_MODE_YN, P.AUTO_DSP_YN, P.INTLK_YN FROM TN_RDS_EQP R, TN_POS_EQP P WHERE 1 = 1 AND R.SITE_ID = P.SITE_ID AND R.EQP_ID = P.EQP_ID AND R.USE_STAT_CD = P.USE_STAT_CD AND R.SITE_ID = #{siteId} AND R.USE_STAT_CD = #{useStatCd} AND R.EQP_ID = #{eqpId}

SELECT R.PORT_ID ,R.CARR_TYP ,R.PORT_TYP ,P.ACES_MODE_CD ,P.CTRL_MODE_CD ,P.STAT_CD ,P.TRSF_STAT_CD ,P.CARR_ID FROM TN_RDS_PORT R ,TN_POS_PORT P WHERE P.SITE_ID = R.SITE_ID AND P.EQP_ID = R.EQP_ID AND P.PORT_ID = R.PORT_ID AND P.SITE_ID = #{siteId} AND P.EQP_ID = #{eqpId} AND P.PORT_ID = #{portId} AND P.USE_STAT_CD = #{useStatCd} AND R.USE_STAT_CD = #{useStatCd}

SELECT R.PORT_ID ,R.PORT_TYP ,R.CARR_TYP ,P.ACES_MODE_CD ,P.CTRL_MODE_CD ,P.STAT_CD ,P.TRSF_STAT_CD ,P.CARR_ID FROM TN_RDS_PORT R,TN_POS_PORT P WHERE R.SITE_ID = P.SITE_ID AND R.EQP_ID = P.EQP_ID AND R.PORT_ID = P.PORT_ID AND R.SITE_ID = #{siteId} AND R.USE_STAT_CD = #{useStatCd} AND R.EQP_ID = #{eqpId} AND R.PORT_ID = #{portId}
